verses.kjv: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,
verses.web: I therefore, the prisoner in the Lord, beg you to walk worthily of the calling with which you were called,
verses.ct: So I urge you — and I'm writing this as a prisoner for the Lord — to live in a way that matches the calling God has given you.

verses.kjv: With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
verses.web: with all lowliness and humility, with patience, bearing with one another in love,
verses.ct: Be humble and gentle. Be patient with each other, putting up with one another's faults because of love.

verses.kjv: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
verses.web: being eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
verses.ct: Make every effort to stay united in the Spirit, held together by peace.

verses.kjv: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;
verses.web: There is one body and one Spirit, even as you also were called in one hope of your calling,
verses.ct: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you were all called to one shared hope.

verses.kjv: One Lord, one faith, one baptism,
verses.web: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,
verses.ct: One Lord, one faith, one baptism,

verses.kjv: One God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
verses.web: one God and Father of all, who is over all and through all, and in us all.
verses.ct: and one God and Father of all, who is above all, works through all, and lives in all of you.

verses.kjv: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
verses.web: But to each one of us, the grace was given according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
verses.ct: But each one of us has been given grace in the specific measure that Christ chose to give it.

verses.kjv: Wherefore he saith, When he ascended up on high, he led captivity captive, and gave gifts unto men.
verses.web: Therefore he says, “When he ascended on high, he led captivity captive, and gave gifts to people.”
verses.ct: That's why Scripture says, "When he ascended to the heights, he led captivity captive and gave gifts to people."

verses.kjv: (Now that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?
verses.web: Now this, “He ascended”, what is it but that he also first descended into the lower parts of the earth?
verses.ct: Now, when it says "he ascended," that means he must have first descended to the lower parts of the earth.

verses.kjv: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens, that he might fill all things.)
verses.web: He who descended is the one who also ascended far above all the heavens, that he might fill all things.
verses.ct: The one who descended is the same one who ascended far above all the heavens, so that he might fill all things.

verses.kjv: And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;
verses.web: He gave some to be apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, shepherds and teachers;
verses.ct: He gave some people to be apostles, some to be prophets, some to be evangelists, and some to be pastors and teachers.

verses.kjv: For the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ:
verses.web: for the perfecting of the saints, to the work of serving, to the building up of the body of Christ,
verses.ct: He did this to equip God's people for the work of serving and to build up the body of Christ.

verses.kjv: Till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:
verses.web: until we all attain to the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God, to a full grown man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ,
verses.ct: This will continue until all of us reach unity in our faith and in our knowledge of the Son of God — becoming fully mature, measured by nothing less than the full stature of Christ himself.

verses.kjv: That we henceforth be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive;
verses.web: that we may no longer be children, tossed back and forth and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the trickery of men, in craftiness, after the wiles of error;
verses.ct: Then we won't be like children anymore, tossed around by waves and blown in every direction by whatever new teaching comes along, manipulated by people who use tricks and clever schemes to lead others astray.

verses.kjv: But speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:
verses.web: but speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him who is the head, Christ,
verses.ct: Instead, by speaking the truth in love, we will grow up in every way into Christ, who is the head.

verses.kjv: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.
verses.web: from whom all the body, being fitted and knit together through that which every joint supplies, according to the working in measure of each individual part, makes the body increase to the building up of itself in love.
verses.ct: From him, the whole body is fitted and held together by every supporting joint. As each individual part does its work, the body grows and builds itself up in love.

verses.kjv: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,
verses.web: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that you no longer walk as the rest of the Gentiles also walk, in the futility of their mind,
verses.ct: So here's what I'm telling you, and I insist on it in the Lord: stop living the way the other Gentiles live, with their empty, pointless thinking.

verses.kjv: Having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:
verses.web: being darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the hardening of their hearts.
verses.ct: Their understanding is clouded in darkness. They're cut off from the life of God because of the ignorance inside them, caused by the hardness of their hearts.

verses.kjv: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
verses.web: They, having become callous, gave themselves up to lust, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
verses.ct: They've lost all sensitivity, so they've thrown themselves into every kind of shameless behavior, greedily practicing every form of impurity.

verses.kjv: But ye have not so learned Christ;
verses.web: But you didn’t learn Christ that way,
verses.ct: But that's not what you learned when you came to know Christ.

verses.kjv: If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:
verses.web: if indeed you heard him, and were taught in him, even as truth is in Jesus:
verses.ct: Surely you heard his message and were taught the truth that is found in Jesus —

verses.kjv: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;
verses.web: that you put away, as concerning your former way of life, the old man that grows corrupt after the lusts of deceit,
verses.ct: that you must strip off your old self, the way of life you used to follow, which was being destroyed by its own deceptive desires.

verses.kjv: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind;
verses.web: and that you be renewed in the spirit of your mind,
verses.ct: Instead, let your thinking be completely renewed from the inside out.

verses.kjv: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
verses.web: and put on the new man, who in the likeness of God has been created in righteousness and holiness of truth.
verses.ct: Then put on your new self — the person God created to reflect his own righteousness and true holiness.

verses.kjv: Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.
verses.web: Therefore putting away falsehood, speak truth each one with his neighbor. For we are members of one another.
verses.ct: So stop lying to each other. Speak the truth to your neighbor, because we are all parts of the same body.

verses.kjv: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:
verses.web: “Be angry, and don’t sin.” Don’t let the sun go down on your wrath,
verses.ct: If you get angry, don't let it lead you into sin. And don't let the sun go down while you're still holding onto that anger.

verses.kjv: Neither give place to the devil.
verses.web: and don’t give place to the devil.
verses.ct: Don't give the devil an opening.

verses.kjv: Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with his hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.
verses.web: Let him who stole steal no more; but rather let him labor, producing with his hands something that is good, that he may have something to give to him who has need.
verses.ct: If you used to steal, stop stealing. Instead, work hard with your own hands at something good, so you'll have something to share with anyone in need.

verses.kjv: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
verses.web: Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but only what is good for building others up as the need may be, that it may give grace to those who hear.
verses.ct: Don't let any rotten words come out of your mouth. Only say what is helpful for building others up when they need it, so that your words bring grace to everyone who hears them.

verses.kjv: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.
verses.web: Don’t grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.
verses.ct: Don't grieve the Holy Spirit of God, who has sealed you for the day of redemption.

verses.kjv: Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice:
verses.web: Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outcry, and slander be put away from you, with all malice.
verses.ct: Get rid of all bitterness, rage, anger, harsh words, and slander, along with every form of malice.

verses.kjv: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.
verses.web: And be kind to one another, tender hearted, forgiving each other, just as God also in Christ forgave you.
verses.ct: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving each other — just as God forgave you through Christ.
